description: Common MCP servers for Claude Code (user scope)
note: These servers are installed at user scope using install-mcp.sh script

context7.command: claude mcp add --scope user --transport http context7 https://mcp.context7.com/mcp
context7.description: Context7 MCP server for enhanced context management and retrieval

sequential-thinking.command: claude mcp add --scope user sequential-thinking npx @modelcontextprotocol/server-sequential-thinking
sequential-thinking.description: Official MCP server for dynamic and reflective problem-solving through structured thinking

memory.command: claude mcp add --scope user server-memory npx @modelcontextprotocol/server-memory
memory.description: Official MCP server to provides a knowledge graph-based persistent memory system

fetch.command: claude mcp add --scope user server-fetch npx @modelcontextprotocol/server-fetch
fetch.description: Official MCP server to retrieve and convert web content into formats like Markdown, making it easier to process and analyze information from the internet.
